English: better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option

d.f: `寧可~`沒有~，`也~`不要~`不顧~`品質~，`只~`求~`數量~。`如~：「`因為~`參賽~`的~`作品~`水準~`不夠~，`我們~`決定~`寧缺毋濫~，`第一名~`從缺~。」`也~`作~「`寧缺勿濫~」。

English: better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option
